name: Poem
title: Android
summary: Poem is an application for android to provide Selection of best poems by persian famous poets with powerful customization along with advanced search and quick.
explain:
Poem is an application for android to provide Selection of best poems by persian famous poets with powerful customization along with advanced search and quick.

Project features:

- Advanced search with size limitation count.

- Customization background, colors and fonts

- Sharing poems ability

- Add item to favorites

- Copy poem text

- Compatible on multi size device
